text: Kelemane apuni khan majot pora kunba manu khan lukai kene biya rasta te jaise, kunkhan ke poila pora letera kaam kori dibole nimite pathaise, etu biya manu khan pora mangso laga itcha loi kene Isor laga morom logot bodli kori dise, aru taikhan Jisu Khrista Probhu aru Malik ase koi kene namane.
